Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Characters

Class AbstractCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Characters.AbstractCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Character, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NoEntryCharacter, StrategyCharacter, StudentMoverCharacter
public abstract class AbstractCharacter extends Object implements Character, Serializable
This abstract class implements the common methods shared by all the different types of Character.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • useCharacter

      public List<RequestParameter> useCharacter(Player owner, CoinBag bag) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException
      Precedes a character's ability activation. The character sets its activator as its owner. If this is the first time the character is being used in the game, the cost is increased by one. If the character requires a dining room student, it checks if at least one is present in the player's dining room, otherwise throws an exception. It then removes the right amount of coins from the player and returns the right amount to the coin bag. Finally, the method returns a list of parameters it needs in order for its ability to activate, which will be picked up by the controller.
      Specified by:
      useCharacter in interface Character
      Parameters:
      owner - the player who activated this character
      bag - The coin bag to which coins used will be returned
      Returns:
      a list of RequestParameters that will be needed by the game controller
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException
      IllegalArgumentException

    • useAbility

      public void useAbility(Consumer<List<Integer>> consumer, List<Integer> parameterList) throws IllegalStateException, FullTableException, LastRoundException, GameOverException
      Method that executes the character's ability. It passes the list of parameters (in the form of IDs of various pawns/board pieces) to the right Consumer according to the character's ID.
      Specified by:
      useAbility in interface Character
      Parameters:
      consumer - the Consumer that acts on the GameModel
      parameterList - the list of the consumer's parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException
      FullTableException
      LastRoundException
      GameOverException

    • getMaxUses

      public int getMaxUses()
      Return the maximum number of times the ability can be used.
      Returns:
      always 1. If specific character have different max uses the method will be overridden.

    • getUsesLeft

      public int getUsesLeft()
      Return the maximum number of times the ability can be used.
      Returns:
      always 1. If specific character have different max uses the method will be overridden.
